name: Drooiroot
description:
This game was made in 48h during PolyJam 2023, a site of Global Game Jam 2023!

The forest is dying... You are one of the druids that decided to save the world! But you are not alone in your endevour... Not everyone has the same goals as you do though... Play against your friends in this couch multiplayer game. (at least one gamepad is required) And decide with battle who will send their roots across the forest and achieve their goal.

Credits:

Maciej Domański / Merloj  - programming & models

Anna Krawczuk / Ricki - programming & level design

Used assets:

https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-shrubs-flowers-and-mushrooms-3d-low-poly-p...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/starter-assets-third-person-cha...
